name: Pixel me Away
description:
Shoot your way through the layers of the image, beginning with the darker colors and moving on to the brighter layers until the image is revealed! 

You can move the player using the keyboard arrows and rotate using A (counterclockwise rotation) and D (clockwise rotation).

Soon enemies and bombs will be placed throughout the levels, as well as sound effects and music, so stay tuned for updates!

For now there are 4 levels, which repeat. I will love to hear your feedback in the comment section below! Also please comment if you find any bugs 🐛

The artwork is made by me, you can find it in higher resolution through the links below:
